title: Bootstrap Tables
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Styling Data
Bootstrap turns ugly HTML tables into clean interfaces with a single class.

### Base Class
`.table`: Adds padding, border-bottoms, and alignment.

### Modifiers
* `.table-striped`: Zebra striping.
* `.table-hover`: Highlights row on mouse hover.
* `.table-bordered`: Borders on all sides.
* `.table-dark`: Dark theme table.
* `.table-sm`: Compact spacing.

### Responsiveness
Wrap the `<table>` in a `div.table-responsive` to make it scroll horizontally on small screens instead of breaking the layout.

examples.explanation: Prevents the table from causing horizontal scroll on the entire page.

exam_notes: Contextual classes (table-danger) work on rows `<tr>` or cells `<td>`.
Use responsive wrapper for mobile safety.
summary: Bootstrap tables are robust and responsive by default.
